title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Playing on the Xbox - Controlling the airplane
description:
In this video we will look at how to control an airplane using an Xbox controller when playing MSFS 2020. We will look at how you can discover the configuration of the Xbox controller via multiple ways which will also uncover some secret key combinations
